title: Broadcom Inc. Announces Second Quarter Fiscal Year 2021 Financial Results and Quarterly Dividends
text: SAN JOSE, Calif., June 3, 2021 /PRNewswire/ -- Broadcom Inc. (Nasdaq: AVGO), a global technology leader that designs, develops and supplies semiconductor and infrastructure software solutions, today reported financial results for its second quarter of fiscal year 2021, ended May 2, 2021, provided guidance for the third quarter of its fiscal year 2021 and announced its quarterly dividends.
